=Introduction=
A general purpose Java library, developed at [http://www.ai.sri.com/ SRI International's Artificial Intelligence Center] and built on top of Google's [http://code.google.com/p/guava-libraries/ guava-libraries], which adds capabilities in the following areas:

  * General purpose [http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/Util.java utility routines] for String manipulation, Collections, Error, and Math.
  * Extended Iterator semantics ([http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/functionalsequence/FunctionalSequence.java functional sequences] and [http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/functionalsequence/Refiner.java refiners]).
  * Concurrency service for simplifying the [http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/concurrent/BranchAndMerge.java branching and merging] of computation tasks.
  * Simplified [http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/Configuration.java Configuration API].
  * Support for [http://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/log/LogX.java logging] of high-level execution traces.
  * Extensions to [http://code.google.com/p/guava-libraries/wiki/FunctionalExplained Guava's functional idioms].
